[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
FFADE
enum FFADE {...}

Fade flags for CPlayerFuncs::ScreenFade and ScreenFadeAll

Values
FFADE_IN

(0) Just here so we don't pass 0 into the function

FFADE_OUT

(1) Fade out (not in)

FFADE_MODULATE

(2) Modulate (don't blend)

FFADE_STAYOUT

(4) ignores the duration, stays faded out until new ScreenFade message received
